channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Not fixed!, 29th August
item.description:
Photo from this morning at 8.08am, clearly these items are still there as per photo! Stop misleading and misinform people! Remove or this case will be escalated

item.title: Pavement obstruction outside this property, 29th August
item.description:
Dishwasher, large metal frame, granite kitchen worktop other debris outside 4 Montrave Road obstructing the pavement. It’s been dumped here since 21st August - 8 days.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Montrave Road, Penge, London

item.title: Drains not cleaned or cleared, 29th August
item.description:
Here’s a picture of our twice a year cleaned drain. That has been reported as not being done in over a year but will next be cleared under the contractual service level even though it’s not being done by the company they contract it to.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Frinsted Road, Northumberland Heath, London
